psychopy_ext.exp.Task.before_task¶

Task.before_task(text=None, wait=0.5, wait_stim=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Shows text from docstring explaining the task.

Kwargs:
  • text (str, default: None)

    Text to show.

  • wait (float, default: .5)

    How long to wait after the end of showing instructions, in seconds.

  • wait_stim (stimulus or a list of stimuli, default: None)

    During this waiting, which stimuli should be shown. Usually, it would be a fixation spot.

  • **kwargs

    Other parameters for show_text()
